description: List Tenna vehicles with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admin users can list Tenna vehicles. Non-admin users only see vehicles scoped to brokers they are a member of (via broker membership visibility).
validation_notes: Boolean filter flags (has-*, is-*) require strict true/false values; other values are rejected. Date-time filters require non-empty, parseable date-time values (ISO 8601 per help text).

flags.name: --broker
flags.validation: Example: 123.

flags.name: --has-tractor
flags.validation: Must be true or false.

flags.name: --has-trailer
flags.validation: Must be true or false.

flags.name: --has-equipment
flags.validation: Must be true or false. Example: true.

flags.name: --assigned-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --equipment-assigned-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --trailer-set-at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum trailer set timestamp (ISO 8601)
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --trailer-set-at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum trailer set timestamp (ISO 8601)
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --is-trailer-set-at
flags.description: Filter by has trailer set timestamp (true/false)
flags.validation: Must be true or false.

flags.name: --tractor-set-at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum tractor set timestamp (ISO 8601)
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --tractor-set-at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum tractor set timestamp (ISO 8601)
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --is-tractor-set-at
flags.description: Filter by has tractor set timestamp (true/false)
flags.validation: Must be true or false.

flags.name: --equipment-set-at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum equipment set timestamp (ISO 8601)
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --equipment-set-at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum equipment set timestamp (ISO 8601)
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --is-equipment-set-at
flags.description: Filter by has equipment set timestamp (true/false)
flags.validation: Must be true or false.

flags.name: --created-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --created-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --is-created-at
flags.validation: Must be true or false.

flags.name: --updated-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --updated-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty, parseable date-time.

flags.name: --is-updated-at
flags.validation: Must be true or false.
